CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
OldVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is being cancelled as service team has deprecated this feature. When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message reminders
OldVersion.description: When Outlook identifies that a user could have forgotten to respond to or follow up on an email message, it could bring that email back to the top of the inbox, marking it needing an action. A maximum of one email message can be brought to the top of the user's inbox at a time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Expanded support for device-bound passkeys in Microsoft Entra ID
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID will add support for device-bound passkeys stored on computers and mobile devices as an authentication method in preview, in addition to the existing support for FIDO2 security keys. This enables users to perform phishing-resistant authentication using the devices that they already have. The existing FIDO2 authentication methods policy and end user experiences will be changed to support this preview release. For organizations to opt-in to this preview, admins will need to enforce key restrictions to allow specified passkey providers in the FIDO2 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules. Note: The month and status have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
OldVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules. Note: The month and status have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Consumer Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.  this feature has been delivered but is not in scope for the commercial roadmap and is being removed to reduce confusion.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  A new item will be published in the future for the commercial customers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
OldVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
OldVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
OldVersion.description: Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
OldVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Lab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab team prompt publishing
OldVersion.description: This feature gives commercial customers the ability to publish Copilot prompts to groups within their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
OldVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy support for additional external content
CurrentVersion.description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy "Curated by Microsoft" content provider support
OldVersion.description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources, and enables you to find resources related to Copilot under the "AI and Copilot resources" provider. This new provider will power content for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab is now available in Teams on iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Explore and use suggested Copilot prompts in Copilot Lab in the Teams app on iOS and Android.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 on mobile
OldVersion.description: Copilot Lab will allow users to browse and use suggested prompts in Copilot for Microsoft 365 on mobile platforms.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
OldVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Video templates
CurrentVersion.description: Create and highlight videocentric publications, like meeting content or executive messages, with the new video templates in Viva Amplify; this presents videos that are inline, playable, and beautiful.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Video templates
OldVersion.description: Create and highlight videocentric publications, like meeting content or executive messages, with the new video templates in Viva Amplify; this presents videos that are inline, playable, and beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
OldVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Save Prompt, Share Prompt, and Try in App release
OldVersion.description: With this feature, users of Copilot in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote will be able to save prompts that they have created to Copilot Lab and share them with their coworkers. Also, users on the Copilot Lab website who find a Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or OneNote prompt that they like will be able to launch Copilot and run that prompt with a single click of the new "Try in Copilot" button.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - New and trending prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Keep track of new and trending prompts in your organization in Copilot Lab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab trending and recommended prompts
OldVersion.description: With this feature, customers will be able to see which prompts are new or trending within their organization and receive personalized prompt recommendations in Copilot Lab, powered by Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
OldVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
CurrentVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
OldVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Passkey authentication in brokered Microsoft apps on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID users can now use a passkey to sign into Microsoft apps on Android devices where an authentication broker like Microsoft Authenticator or Microsoft Intune Company Portal is installed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Passkey authentication in brokered Microsoft apps on Android
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID users can now use a passkey to sign into Microsoft apps on Android devices where an authentication broker like Microsoft Authenticator or Microsoft Intune Company Portal is installed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows will provide native Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) controls for connected cameras that support this capability. The feature will initially contain limited support for cameras with mechanical/optical PTZ, with digital PTZ to come in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows will provide native Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) controls for connected cameras that support this capability. The feature will initially contain limited support for cameras with mechanical/optical PTZ, with digital PTZ to come in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User uploaded custom background images for the new VDI solution for Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: If users want to change what appears behind them in their video meeting or call, they can either blur their background, use Teams virtual background templates, or with a Teams Premium license, they can change their Teams meeting background to a branded logo or image specific to their company. With this new feature, now users on the new VDI solution for Teams can also replace their background entirely with any image they want by uploading it through the 'Video effects and Settings' option.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User uploaded custom background images for the new VDI solution for Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: If users want to change what appears behind them in their video meeting or call, they can either blur their background, use Teams virtual background templates, or with a Teams Premium license, they can change their Teams meeting background to a branded logo or image specific to their company. With this new feature, now users on the new VDI solution for Teams can also replace their background entirely with any image they want by uploading it through the 'Video effects and Settings' option.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: For users signed in with an Entra account, Microsoft Copilot will offer enterprise data protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Labels in grid view
CurrentVersion.description: Labels for your tasks will be shown in grid view in a new Labels column in basic plans. You can get a better overview of your tasks at a glance since you will no longer need to open task details to view labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to filter meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
CurrentVersion.description: Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
OldVersion.description: Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection and Conditional Access
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can use insider risk levels in their Conditional Access policies.  This includes minor experience changes in the Adaptive Protection tab in Insider Risk Management, including adding total counts for Conditional Access policies that use Adaptive Protection and new user insights in the user activity timeline when a user is added or removed from an insider risk level. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross location Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: Cross-Location Shifts empowers organizations by enabling their Frontline workers to access and select open shifts from multiple locations within a region. Managers benefit from a larger labor pool by opening shift availability across multiple locations: a worker from one store location may select a shift in any other store across their region. This feature is accessible both via desktop and mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy support for additional external content
CurrentVersion.description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab is now available in Teams on iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Explore and use suggested Copilot prompts in Copilot Lab in the Teams app on iOS and Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Easier to find your most recent templates
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the Viva Amplify template display include showing the most recently modified templates on the campaign overview page for easy access and separating the Viva Amplify provided templates from the user-saved campaign templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Video templates
CurrentVersion.description: Create and highlight videocentric publications, like meeting content or executive messages, with the new video templates in Viva Amplify; this presents videos that are inline, playable, and beautiful.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Improved authoring experience
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the Viva Amplify editors for both Outlook and Teams distribution channels to improve previewing and editing. These updates will provide improvements to load time and create a coherent audience selection experience across the channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - Share a prompt with a coworker
CurrentVersion.description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Lab, inspiring your co-workers to acheive more with Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab - New and trending prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Keep track of new and trending prompts in your organization in Copilot Lab.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
CurrentVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Barriers v2 support for all new onboarding customers
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Information Barriers v2 (IB v2) is now available for all new onboarding customers. IB v2 has enhanced architecture which enables the following new features:

Large-scale segment support: The segment limit in organizations has increased to 5,000.
Multi-segment support: Users can be assigned to up to 10 segments.
Flexible user discoverability: Organizations can now choose to allow IB-protected users to discover each other while adhering to IB communication and collaboration policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Passkey authentication in brokered Microsoft apps on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Entra ID users can now use a passkey to sign into Microsoft apps on Android devices where an authentication broker like Microsoft Authenticator or Microsoft Intune Company Portal is installed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows will provide native Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) controls for connected cameras that support this capability. The feature will initially contain limited support for cameras with mechanical/optical PTZ, with digital PTZ to come in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User uploaded custom background images for the new VDI solution for Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: If users want to change what appears behind them in their video meeting or call, they can either blur their background, use Teams virtual background templates, or with a Teams Premium license, they can change their Teams meeting background to a branded logo or image specific to their company. With this new feature, now users on the new VDI solution for Teams can also replace their background entirely with any image they want by uploading it through the 'Video effects and Settings' option.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: For users signed in with an Entra account, Microsoft Copilot will offer enterprise data protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Labels in grid view
CurrentVersion.description: Labels for your tasks will be shown in grid view in a new Labels column in basic plans. You can get a better overview of your tasks at a glance since you will no longer need to open task details to view labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to filter meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts
CurrentVersion.description: Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.
